data.name: howToLoginOnApp
data.value: How to log in to the application

data.name: howToRegisterOnApp
data.value: How to register in the application

data.name: txtHowToLoginOnApp
data.value: To log into your account, enter the e-mail address and password associated with your account. Click "Login" to access your account. If you have forgotten your password, click "Forgot your password?" to retrieve it. Remember to keep your account secure by not sharing your password with anyone and log out of your account when using a shared device.

data.name: txtHowToLoginViaFacebook
data.value: To log into your account via Facebook, click the "Facebook" button on the login page. This will redirect you to the Facebook login page. Enter your login credentials and authorize access to your basic information. You will then be redirected back to our page and have access to your account. Note that this option is only available if you have a Facebook account and have used it to register previously.

data.name: txtHowToLoginViaGoogle
data.value: To sign into your account via Google, click the "Google" button on the login page. This will redirect you to the Google login page. Enter your login credentials and authorize permission to access your basic information. You will then be redirected back to our page and will have access to your account. Keep in mind that this option will only be available if you have a Google account and have used it to register previously.

data.name: txtHowToLoginViaOutlook
data.value: To log into your account via Outlook, click the "Outlook" button on the login page. This will redirect you to the login page with Outlook. Enter your login credentials and authorize access to your basic information. You will then be redirected back to our page and have access to your account. Keep in mind that this option will only be available if you have anOutlook account and have used it to register previously.

data.name: txtHowToLoginViaTwitter
data.value: To log into your account via Twitter, click the "Twitter" button on the login page. This will redirect you to the Twitter login page. Enter your login credentials and authorize permission to access your basic information. You will then be redirected back to our page and have access to your account. Keep in mind that this option is only available if you have a Twitter account and have used it to register previously.

data.name: txtHowToRegisterOnApp
data.value: To create an account, fill in the email, password, password confirmation, first name and last name. Make sure the email is valid, the passwords entered are the same, and meet security requirements (such as being at least 6 characters long). Make sure the first and last name field is filled in. Click "Register" to complete the process. Remember to keep your account secure by not sharing your password with anyone.

data.name: txtHowToRegisterViaFacebook
data.value: To create an account via Facebook, click the "Facebook" button on the account creation page. This will redirect you to the Facebook login page. Enter your login credentials and authorize access to your basic information. You will then be redirected back to our page and your account will be created automatically. Note that this option is only available if you have a Facebook account.

data.name: txtHowToRegisterViaGoogle
data.value: To create an account via Google, click the "Google" button on the account creation page. This will redirect you to the Google login page. Enter your login credentials and authorize permission to access your basic information. You will then be redirected back to our page and your account will be created automatically. Please note that this option is only available if you have a Google account.

data.name: txtHowToRegisterViaOutlook
data.value: To create an account via Outlook, click on the "Outlook" button on the account creation page. This will redirect you to the login page with Outlook. Enter your login credentials and authorize access to your basic information. You will then be redirected back to our page and your account will be created automatically. Note that this option is only available if you have an Outlook account.

data.name: txtHowToRegisterViaTwitter
data.value: To create an account via Twitter, click the "Twitter" button on the account creation page. This will redirect you to the Twitter login page. Enter your login credentials and authorize access to your basic information. You will then be redirected back to our page and your account will be created automatically. Note that this option is only available if you have a Twitter account.

data.name: txtSearchHelpArticles
data.value: Look for articles that will help you

data.name: txtWelcome
data.value: Are you looking for the most efficient way to manage your ATL or ATL grouping ?
